description: System-generated unique identifier for this record; serves as the primary key for reference and joins.
Date-time the record was created or last modified, in yyyymmddHHMMSSmmm numeric string with millisecond precision; timezone not indicated—confirm with SME.
SAE viscosity grade designation for engine oil used to determine appropriate service and parts selection.
Canonical code representing the oil grade, used as the stable identifier in integrations and lookups; often equals the SAE viscosity designation.
Monetary cost associated with the oil type—likely unit price per container or volume; currency and unit conventions should be confirmed with SME.
Identifier from a prior system used to map or reconcile this record during migration; may be null for natively created records.
Name of the source table in the legacy system from which this record originated; supports lineage and back-referencing during migration.
